I need help making sure my postback is firing
Sure, I can help with that! Could you please let me know which tracking platform or service you are using for your postback? This will help me provide more specific instructions.

Thanks for letting me know you're using ClickBank. To ensure your postback is firing correctly, please follow these steps:
1. Log in to your ClickBank account.
2. Navigate to the 'Vendor Settings' section.
3. Select 'My Site' and then 'Advanced Tools'.
4. Under 'Instant Notification URL', enter the postback URL provided by NewsBreak.
5. Make sure the status is set to 'Active'.
6. Save your changes.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to ClickBank's official documentation or contact their support team if needed.

Your postback URL for ClickBank integration with NewsBreak is: https://business.newsbreak.com/tracking/clickbank. Make sure to set this URL in the 'Instant Notification URL' field in your ClickBank account settings.
